title: COVID-19 Vaccine Information
description: Enter your zip code to find COVID vaccine locations in North Carolina. Up-to-date, reliable information on vaccines.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccine Information COVID-19 vaccines are available to everyone 6 months and older. You are due for another dose if your last COVID vaccine was before September 2022. Free Vaccines Available While Supplies Last The federal public health emergency ended May 11. North Carolina will continue to offer free COVID-19 vaccines while supplies last. You can get a free vaccine regardless of your immigration status. You can also get a free vaccine even if you don't have insurance. Once emergency supplies run out, COVID-19 vaccines will be available like other vaccines. Medicare, Medicaid, and private insurance will cover the cost. If you don't have insurance, you'll have to pay out of pocket.
